BIO

Focused Web Developer with a passion for technology and solving complex problems. Former Freelance Web Developer with experience building websites and databases, and managing servers for clients and hobby purposes. Naturally gifted at problem-solving on both familiar and unfamiliar code, and adept at delivering a product exactly as requested or envisioned.
